[ctx_dfn.h] Type: Program Context

contents



#include "standard.h"









 CTX_T 
 Abstract program context type 





 Category of context variables 


#define CTX_ARG      1
#define CTX_OPT      2
#define CTX_ENV      3

 Types of context variables 


#define CTX_FLAG     1
#define CTX_INT      2
#define CTX_PATH     3
#define CTX_STRING   4
#define CTX_NAME     5
#define CTX_VARG     "vargs"
